tasks.build:all: deno task build && deno task upload:script && deno task upload:exe && deno task upload:template && deno task purge:cache
tasks.build: deno task build:linux && deno task build:mac
tasks.build:linux: OUT_DIR=$(pwd)/dist && OUT_FILE="$OUT_DIR/slv-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-exe" && TMP_BASE="${TMPDIR:-/tmp}" && TMP_OUT="$TMP_BASE/slv-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-exe" && mkdir -p "$TMP_BASE" && rm -f "$TMP_OUT" && deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --no-check --output "$TMP_OUT" cli/src/index.ts && mkdir -p "$OUT_DIR" && rm -f "$OUT_FILE" && mv "$TMP_OUT" "$OUT_FILE" && tar -czvf "$OUT_DIR/slv-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu-exe.tar.gz" "$OUT_FILE"
tasks.build:mac: OUT_DIR=$(pwd)/dist && OUT_FILE="$OUT_DIR/slv-x86_64-apple-darwin-exe" && TMP_BASE="${TMPDIR:-/tmp}" && TMP_OUT="$TMP_BASE/slv-x86_64-apple-darwin-exe" && mkdir -p "$TMP_BASE" && rm -f "$TMP_OUT" && deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin --no-check --output "$TMP_OUT" cli/src/index.ts && mkdir -p "$OUT_DIR" && rm -f "$OUT_FILE" && mv "$TMP_OUT" "$OUT_FILE" && tar -czvf "$OUT_DIR/slv-x86_64-apple-darwin-exe.tar.gz" "$OUT_FILE"
